div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1355 Marmaris (anc. Physcus), Caria, 1945 Burial: 100-90 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 10 AV, 1016 AR Stratonicea: 1 hemidr. (as BMC 1) Rhodes: 4 tetradr. (as BMC 118 ff.) 39 didr. (as BMC 50 [1]; 129 ff. [38]) 288 dr. (as BMC 235 ff.) 684 hemidr. (as BMC 291 ff.) 2 AV St. 2 AV half-st. 6 AV quarter-st. Disposition: London 725, Oxford remainder Hackens, BCH 1965, pp. 520 ff. According to some reports the hd. was discovered near Milas (anc. Mylasa), Caria
